# Pywalc
 
![Screenshot](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/63899044/178858411-98158a3d-76c0-4a61-a797-2e9288864ec7.gif)

### Installation
```
pip install pywalc
```

### Use
```bash
[$] pywalc
 * Online: https://medium-fixed-polyester-runs.trycloudflare.com
```
